revised_title: Twistor Theory and Energy-Momentum in Gravitational Fields at Spatial Infinity
tldr: This article explores the concept of energy-momentum and angular momentum in general relativity using twistor theory. The author demonstrates that a global concept of twistor space exists at spatial infinity for radially smooth space-times with asymptotically electric Weyl curvature. Global conservation laws for energy-momentum and angular momentum are obtained, and the ten conserved quantities are shown to be invariant under asymptotic coordinate transformations.
